# Winmax Gulf - Smart Glass & LED Display Solutions

> Winmax Gulf is a leading provider of PDLC smart glass, LED display solutions, and DJ club entertainment systems in the UAE and GCC region.

## About
Winmax Gulf specializes in innovative visual and glass technology solutions for commercial, residential, and entertainment spaces. We offer cutting-edge PDLC (Polymer Dispersed Liquid Crystal) smart glass that switches between transparent and opaque states, high-resolution LED displays for advertising and signage, and complete DJ club solutions for nightlife venues.

## Products & Services

### PDLC Smart Glass
- Switchable privacy glass technology
- Instant transparency control via electrical current
- Applications: conference rooms, hospitals, hotels, residential, retail
- Energy efficient and UV protection
- Custom sizes and shapes available

### LED Display Solutions
- Indoor and outdoor LED screens
- High brightness and resolution
- Digital signage and advertising displays
- Video walls and rental screens
- Custom pixel pitch options

### DJ Club Solutions
- Complete nightclub lighting systems
- Audio-visual integration
- LED dance floors and walls
- Professional DJ booth setups
- Immersive entertainment experiences

## Contact
- Website: https://winmaxgulf.com
- Location: United Arab Emirates
- Services: UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman
